methods.Synopsis: Retrieve a filtered, paged list of content resources

parameters.Name: detail
parameters.Description: The level of detail in the response for each record

parameters.Name: page
parameters.Description: The (1-indexed) page number to retrieve.

parameters.Name: per_page
parameters.Description: The number of entries to retrieve per page.

parameters.Name: user_id
parameters.Description: Content filtered for a specified user. Accepts both object ids and slugs, ex. '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d' or 'john-6'

parameters.Name: campaign_id
parameters.Description: Content filtered for a specified campaign. Accepts both object ids and slugs, ex. '51f05bc04aaaae4ae80000d' or 'awesome-video-campaign-1'

parameters.Name: category
parameters.Description: Filter content using the specified category name(s)

parameters.Name: include_empty_categories
parameters.Description: Relevant only if filtering by category

parameters.Name: date_type
parameters.Description: Filter content using the specified date field

parameters.Name: start
parameters.Description:
Relevant only if filtering by date. Content greater or equal to this timestamp will be returned.

Beta Warning: The format for this field will soon change to ISO 8601.

parameters.Name: end
parameters.Description:
Relevant only if filtering by date. Content less than or equal to this timestamp will be returned.

Beta Warning: The format for this field will soon change to ISO 8601.

parameters.Name: listener_id
parameters.Description: Filter content by listener (user) id. Accepts both object ids and slugs, ex. '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d' or 'samantha-james-2'

parameters.Name: content_type_id
parameters.Description: Filter content by content type id. Accepts an object id only.

parameters.Name: search
parameters.Description: Filter content by search phrase

parameters.Name: content_number
parameters.Description: Filter content by content number

parameters.Name: state
parameters.Description: Filter content by content state

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: Content id or slug, ex 'welcome-to-kapost' or '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d'

parameters.Name: detail
parameters.Description: The level of detail in the response for each record

parameters.Name: idea_title
parameters.Description: Idea title

parameters.Name: idea
parameters.Description: Idea content (HTML OK)

parameters.Name: content_title
parameters.Description: Content title

parameters.Name: content
parameters.Description: Content (HTML OK)

parameters.Name: assignee_id
parameters.Description: Assigned user id or username slug for this content, ex '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d' or 'reuben-dewitt'

parameters.Name: privacy

EnumeratedDescription.private: Only invited users may see this content (See invitee_ids below)
EnumeratedDescription.members: Any member of your instance may see this content

parameters.Description: Select the privacy setting for this content

parameters.Name: invitee_ids
parameters.Description: Array of invited user object ids or username slugs, relevant only if a content privacy is set to private and not yet in production

parameters.Name: is_draft
parameters.Description: Whether or not this content is in draft state

parameters.Name: campaign_ids
parameters.Description: Array of campaign object ids or slugs associated with this content

parameters.Name: submission_deadline
parameters.Description:
Unix timestamp (in milliseconds, ex '1376092036000')

Beta Warning: The format for this field will soon change to ISO 8601.

parameters.Name: publish_deadline
parameters.Description:
Unix timestamp (in milliseconds, ex '1376092036000')

Beta Warning: The format for this field will soon change to ISO 8601.

parameters.Name: payment_type

EnumeratedDescription.user: Uses the author's rate for the payment amount.
EnumeratedDescription.fixed: Uses a fixed rate for the payment amount.

parameters.Description: Use a payment for this post, and select a payment strategy

parameters.Name: payment_fixed_rate
parameters.Description: Relevent when using a fixed rate for the payment amount for this post.

parameters.Name: tags
parameters.Description: A string containing a comma-separated list of tags

parameters.Name: external_file_url
parameters.Description: Certain types of posts, such as google drive documents require an external URL reference

parameters.Name: persona_ids
parameters.Description: If using personas and buying stages, an array of object id's of personas targeted by this content.

parameters.Name: stage_ids
parameters.Description: If using personas and buying stages, an array of object id's of buying stages targeted by this content.

parameters.Name: content_type_id
parameters.Description: Change the content type

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: Content id or slug, ex 'welcome-to-kapost' or '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d'

parameters.Name: operation

EnumeratedDescription.submit: Submit an idea to share with everyone
EnumeratedDescription.unsubmit: Revert a submission back into an idea
EnumeratedDescription.reject: Reject a submission (must supply reason text)

parameters.Description: An optional action to perform on this content

parameters.Name: reject_reason
parameters.Description: Relevent only if performing a reject operation. The reason for the rejection.

parameters.Name: idea_title
parameters.Description: Idea title

parameters.Name: idea
parameters.Description: Idea content (HTML OK)

parameters.Name: content_title
parameters.Description: Content title

parameters.Name: content
parameters.Description: Content (HTML OK)

parameters.Name: assignee_id
parameters.Description: Assigned user id or username slug for this content, ex '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d' or 'reuben-dewitt'

parameters.Name: privacy

EnumeratedDescription.private: Only invited users may see this content (See invitee_ids below)
EnumeratedDescription.members: Any member of your instance may see this content

parameters.Description: Select the privacy setting for this content

parameters.Name: invitee_ids
parameters.Description: Array of invited user object ids or username slugs, relevant only if a content privacy is set to private and not yet in production

parameters.Name: is_draft
parameters.Description: Whether or not this content is in draft state

parameters.Name: campaign_ids
parameters.Description: Array of campaign object ids or slugs associated with this content

parameters.Name: submission_deadline
parameters.Description:
Unix timestamp (in milliseconds, ex '1376092036000')

Beta Warning: The format for this field will soon change to ISO 8601.

parameters.Name: publish_deadline
parameters.Description:
Unix timestamp (in milliseconds, ex '1376092036000')

Beta Warning: The format for this field will soon change to ISO 8601.

parameters.Name: payment_type

EnumeratedDescription.user: Uses the author's rate for the payment amount.
EnumeratedDescription.fixed: Uses a fixed rate for the payment amount.

parameters.Description: Use a payment for this post, and select a payment strategy

parameters.Name: payment_fixed_rate
parameters.Description: Relevent when using a fixed rate for the payment amount for this post.

parameters.Name: tags
parameters.Description: A string containing a comma-separated list of tags

parameters.Name: external_file_url
parameters.Description: Certain types of posts, such as google drive documents require an external URL reference

parameters.Name: persona_ids
parameters.Description: If using personas and buying stages, an array of object id's of personas targeted by this content.

parameters.Name: stage_ids
parameters.Description: If using personas and buying stages, an array of object id's of buying stages targeted by this content.

parameters.Name: content_type_id
parameters.Description: Modify the content type.

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: Content id or slug, ex 'welcome-to-kapost' or '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d'

methods.Synopsis: Retrieves a list of all instance members (and eligible groups) and their visibility and notification configuration for the specified content

parameters.Name: content_id
parameters.Description: The content id or slug, ex 'welcome-to-kapost' or '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d'

methods.Synopsis: Grant access to the specified content to an individual contributor

parameters.Name: content_id
parameters.Description: The content id or slug, ex 'welcome-to-kapost' or '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d'

parameters.Name: user_id
parameters.Description: The id of the contributor that should be granted access to the specified content

methods.Synopsis: Change a user's notification setting for the specified content

parameters.Name: content_id
parameters.Description: The content id or slug, ex 'welcome-to-kapost' or '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d'

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: The id of the contributor to modify

parameters.Name: notification_option
parameters.Description: The notification strategy for the specified user

methods.Synopsis: Revoke access to this content for an individual contributor

parameters.Name: content_id
parameters.Description: The content id or slug, ex 'welcome-to-kapost' or '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d'

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: The id of the contributor that should have access revoked from the specified content

methods.Synopsis: Grant access to this content for muliple contributors OR for a group containing contributors

parameters.Name: content_id
parameters.Description: The content id or slug, ex 'welcome-to-kapost' or '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d'

parameters.Name: ids
parameters.Description: The ids of contributors that should have access granted to the specified content

parameters.Name: group_id
parameters.Description: The id of a group containing contributors that should have access granted to the specified content

methods.Synopsis: Grant access to this content for muliple contributors

parameters.Name: content_id
parameters.Description: The content id or slug, ex 'welcome-to-kapost' or '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d'

parameters.Name: ids
parameters.Description: The ids of contributors that should have access revoked from the specified content

methods.Synopsis: Retrieve a paged list of custom fields for your current instance

parameters.Name: page
parameters.Description: The (1-indexed) page number to retrieve.

parameters.Name: per_page
parameters.Description: The number of entries to retrieve per page.

methods.Synopsis: Retrieve a custom field from your current instance

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: Custom field id, ex '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d'

methods.Synopsis: Create a custom field for your current instance

parameters.Name: field_type
parameters.Description: The type of field to create

parameters.Name: display_label
parameters.Description: Display name of the field to create

parameters.Name: name
parameters.Description: Field name (Must be unique to your instance)

parameters.Name: location
parameters.Description: Location of this field

parameters.Name: default_value
parameters.Description: Relevant only if field_type is 'text'

parameters.Name: rss_field_type
parameters.Description: Relevant only if field_type is 'rss'

parameters.Name: select_values
parameters.Description: Array of values to select from, relevant only if field_type is 'select' or 'multiselect'.

parameters.Name: editor_or_admin_only
parameters.Description: Field option: If true, this field is only viewable by Editors and Admins.

parameters.Name: display_as_column_selector
parameters.Description: Field option: If true, this field will be available as a column on content feeds. Relevant only if field_type is 'text', 'select', 'multiselect', 'date', or 'rss'

parameters.Name: display_as_filter
parameters.Description: Field option: If true, this field will be available as a custom filter on content feeds. Relevant only if field_type is 'select' or 'multiselect'

parameters.Name: required_field
parameters.Description: Field option: If true, this field will be required when creating a new post.

parameters.Name: html
parameters.Description: Field option: If true, this field will provide a rich editor and allow HTML. Relevant only if field_type is 'text'

parameters.Name: multiline
parameters.Description: Field option: If true, this field will provide a multiline editor. Relevant only if field_type is 'text'

methods.Synopsis: Update a custom field for your current instance

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: Custom field id, ex '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d'

parameters.Name: display_label
parameters.Description: Display name of the field to create

parameters.Name: name
parameters.Description: Field name (Must be unique to your instance)

parameters.Name: location
parameters.Description: Location of this field

parameters.Name: default_value
parameters.Description: Relevant only if field_type is 'text'

parameters.Name: rss_field_type
parameters.Description: Relevant only if field_type is 'rss'

parameters.Name: select_values
parameters.Description: Array of values to select from, relevant only if field_type is 'select' or 'multiselect'.

parameters.Name: editor_or_admin_only
parameters.Description: Field option: If true, this field is only viewable by Editors and Admins.

parameters.Name: display_as_column_selector
parameters.Description: Field option: If true, this field will be available as a column on content feeds. Relevant only if field_type is 'text', 'select', 'date', or 'rss'

parameters.Name: display_as_filter
parameters.Description: Field option: If true, this field will be available as a custom filter on content feeds. Relevant only if field_type is 'select' or 'multiselect'

parameters.Name: required_field
parameters.Description: Field option: If true, this field will be required when creating a new post.

parameters.Name: html
parameters.Description: Field option: If true, this field will provide a rich editor and allow HTML. Relevant only if field_type is 'text'

parameters.Name: multiline
parameters.Description: Field option: If true, this field will provide a multiline editor. Relevant only if field_type is 'text'

methods.Synopsis: Delete a custom field from your current instance

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: Custom field id, ex '51f05bc04aaaae4ae800000d'
